GP10bhpc101u:289: śrīśuka uvāca antarhite bhagavati sahasaiva vrajāṅganāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:290: atapyaṃs tam acakṣāṇāḥ kariṇya iva yūthapam //
GP10bhpc101u:293: ākṣiptacittāḥ pramadā ramāpates tās tā viceṣṭā jagṛhus tadātmikāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:294_0: gatyā cānurāgasmitābhyāṃ vibhramekṣitāni savilāsanirīkṣaṇāni taiś ca manoramā ālāpāś
GP10bhpc101u:294_1: ca vihārāḥ krīḍāś ca vibhramā anye ca vilāsās taiś ca ramāpater gatyādibhir etair
GP10bhpc101u:294_2: ākṣiptāny ākṛṣṭāni cittāni yāsāṃ tāḥ, atas tasminn evātmā yāsāṃ tās tasya vividhāś
GP10bhpc101u:297: asāv ahaṃ tv ity abalās tadātmikā nyavediṣuḥ kṛṣṇavihāravibhramāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:299: priyasya gatyādiṣu pratirūḍhā āviṣṭā mūrtayo yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:300: ataḥ kṛṣṇavihāra-vibhramāḥ kṛṣṇasya eva vihāravibhramāḥ krīḍāvilāsā yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:301: aham eva kṛṣṇa iti parasparaṃ niveditavatyaḥ ||BhPC_10,30.3||
GP10bhpc101u:302: gāyantya uccair amum eva saṃhatā vicikyur unmattakavad vanād vanam /
GP10bhpc101u:303: papracchur ākāśavad antaraṃ bahir bhūteṣu santaṃ puruṣaṃ vanaspatīn //
GP10bhpc101u:307: bhūteṣv antaraṃ madhye santaṃ puruṣaṃ bahiś ca santam iti ||BhPC_10,30.4||
GP10bhpc101u:308: dṛṣṭo vaḥ kaccid aśvattha plakṣa nyagrodha no manaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:310: tat prapañcayati navabhiḥ-tatra mahattvād ete paśyeyur ity āśayāśvatthādīn pṛcchanti-dṛṣṭa iti |
GP10bhpc101u:311: premahāsavilasitair avalokanair asmākaṃ mano hṛtvā cora iva gato vo yuṣmābhiḥ kiṃ dṛṣṭa iti
GP10bhpc101u:316: mahāntaḥ svapuṣpair bahūpakāriṇaś ceti kurabakādīn pṛcchanti-kaccid iti |
GP10bhpc101u:317: he kurabakādayaḥ, darpaharaṃ smitaṃ yasya saḥ ito gataḥ kaccid dṛṣṭa iti
GP10bhpc101u:320: alikulaiḥ saha tvā tvāṃ bibhrat tavātipriyas tvayā kiṃ dṛṣṭa iti
GP10bhpc101u:321: mālaty adarśi vaḥ kaccin mallike jātiyūthike /
GP10bhpc101u:322: prītiṃ vo janayan yātaḥ karasparśena mādhavaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:323: guṇātireke 'pi namratvād imāḥ paśyeyur iti pṛcchanti-mālatīti |
GP10bhpc101u:324: he mālati mallike, jāti, yūthike, vo yuṣmābhiḥ kim adarśi dṛṣṭaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:325: karasparśena vaḥ prītiṃ janayan kiṃ yāta iti |
GP10bhpc101u:328: ye 'nye parārthabhavakā yamunopakūlāḥ śaṃsantu kṛṣṇapadavīṃ rahitātmanāṃ naḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:329: phalādibhiḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ saṃtarpakā ete paśyeyur iti pṛcchanti-cūteti |
GP10bhpc101u:331: he cūtādayaḥ, ye 'nye ca parārthabhavakāḥ parārtham eva bhavo janma yeṣāṃ te |
GP10bhpc101u:334: te bhavanto rahitātmanāṃ śūnyacetasāṃ naḥ kṛṣṇapadavīṃ kṛṣṇasya mārgaṃ śaṃsantu kathayantu
GP10bhpc101u:335: kiṃ te kṛtaṃ kṣiti tapo bata keśavāṅghrisparśotsavotpulakitāṅgaruhair vibhāsi /
GP10bhpc101u:336: apy aṅghrisambhava urukramavikramād vā āho varāhavapuṣaḥ parirambhaṇena //
GP10bhpc101u:337: he kṣiti kṣite, tvayā kiṃ tapaḥ kṛtaṃ yā tvaṃ keśavāṅghrisparśotsavā keśavasyāṅghrisparśenotsavo yasyāḥ sā |
GP10bhpc101u:340: tatra viśeṣaṃ pṛcchati-api kim ayam utsavo
GP10bhpc101u:342: yadvā naitāvat kintu urukramavikramāt pūrvam eva trivikramasya padā sarvākramaṇāt |
GP10bhpc101u:344: naitāvad eva, api tu tato 'pi pūrvaṃ varāhasya vapuṣaḥ
GP10bhpc101u:346: atas tvayā nūnaṃ dṛṣṭas taṃ darśayeti ||BhPC_10,30.10||
GP10bhpc101u:347: apy eṇapatny[*27] upagataḥ priyayeha gātrais tanvan dṛśāṃ sakhi sunirvṛtim acyuto vaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:348: kāntāṅgasaṅgakucakuṅkumarañjitāyāḥ kundasrajaḥ kulapater iha vāti gandhaḥ
GP10bhpc101u:349: [*27] eṇapatnīti “patyur no yajñasaṃyoge” iti sūtrād eṇānāṃ
GP10bhpc101u:353: he sakhi eṇapatni, api kim upagataḥ samīpaṃ gataḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:355: priyayā saheti yad uktaṃ tatra dyotakam |
GP10bhpc101u:356: kāṇtāyā aṅgasaṅgas tena tatkucakuṅkumena rañjitāyāḥ kundakusumasrajo gandhaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:359: bāhuṃ priyāṃsa[*28] upadhāya gṛhītapadmo rāmānujas tulasikālikulair madāndhaiḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:360: anvīyamāna iha vas taravaḥ praṇāmaṃ kiṃ vābhinandati caran praṇayāvalokaiḥ
GP10bhpc101u:362: phalabhāreṇa natāṃs tarūn kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇatā iti matvā priyayā saha tasya gativilāsaṃ saṃbhāvayantyaḥ pṛcchanti-bāhum iti |
GP10bhpc101u:363: tulasikāyā alikulair atas tadāmodamadāndhair anvīyamāno 'nugamyamāna iha carann iti
GP10bhpc101u:364: pṛcchatemā latā bāhūn apy āśliṣṭā vanaspateḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:366: kāścid āhuḥ-he sakhyaḥ, imā latāḥ kṛṣṇena saṅgatā nūnam, ata imāḥ pṛcchata
GP10bhpc101u:368: vanaspateḥ patyur bāhunāśliṣṭā api aho bhāgyaṃ nūnaṃ tan nakhaiḥ spṛṣṭā yata utpulakāni bibhrati
GP10bhpc101u:369: na hi svapatisaṅgatāv īdṛkpulakasaṃbhava iti bhāvaḥ
GP10bhpc101u:371: līlā bhagavatas tās tā hy anucakrus tadātmikāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:372: unmattavat prapacchur ity etat prapañcitam idānīṃ-”ramāpates tās tā viceṣṭā jagṛhus tadātmikāḥ” iti yad uktaṃ tat prapañcayati-itīti |
GP10bhpc101u:373: unmattavaco gopyaḥ unmattavacasaś ca tā gopyaś ca |
GP10bhpc101u:378: kasyāścid ity ādibhiś caturbhir anukaraṇaṃ prapañcyate, tataś caturbhis tanmayatvaṃ punar ekenānukaraṇam iti vivekaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:379: pūtanāyantyāḥ pūtanāvad ācarantyāḥ kṛṣṇavad ācarantī stanam apibat |
GP10bhpc101u:383: [*29] ghoṣāḥ kiṅkiṇyas tāsāṃ niḥsvanaiḥ sahitāvaṅghrī karṣantī satī riṅgayāmāsa |
GP10bhpc101u:385: daityāyitvā daityavat tṛṇāvartavad ātmānaṃ kṛtvā ekā kṛṣṇārbhabhāvanāṃ kṛṣṇasyārbhaṃ bālyaṃ bhāvayati yā tām anyāṃ jahāra ||BhPC_10,30.16||
GP10bhpc101u:386: āhūya dūragā yadvat kṛṣṇas tam anuvartatīm /
GP10bhpc101u:387: veṇuṃ kvaṇantīṃ krīḍantīm anyāḥ śaṃsanti sādhv iti //
GP10bhpc101u:389: yadvad yathā kṛṣṇas tathāhūya taṃ kṛṣṇam anuvartamānām |
GP10bhpc101u:391: mā bhaiṣṭa vātavarṣābhyāṃ tattrāṇaṃ vihitaṃ maya /
GP10bhpc101u:393: yatantī prayatnaṃ kurvatī ambaram uttarīyaṃ vastram unnidadhe ūrdhvaṃ dhṛtavatī ||BhPC_10,30.20||
GP10bhpc101u:395: cakṣūṃṣy āśv apidadhvaṃ vo vidhāsye kṣemam añjasā //
GP10bhpc101u:397: baddhānyayā srajā kācit tanvī tatra ulūkhale /
GP10bhpc101u:404: evaṃ punar api vṛndāvane latās tarūṃś ca kṛṣṇaṃ pṛcchantyo vanoddeśe vanapradeśe |
GP10bhpc101u:406: tais taiḥ padais tatpadavīm anvicchantyo 'grato' balāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:414: yan no vihāya govindaḥ prīto yām anayad rahaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:417: yān brahmeśo ramā devī dadhur mūrdhny aghanuttaye[*30] //
GP10bhpc101u:419: he ālyaḥ sakhyaḥ, aho dhanyā atipuṇyā govindāṅghryabjareṇavaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:422: asmābhir apy etad reṇvabhiṣekeṇa tathaiva kṛṣṇaḥ prāptuṃ śakya iti bhāvaḥ ||BhPC_10,30.29||
GP10bhpc101u:423: tasyā amūni naḥ kṣobhaṃ kurvanty uccaiḥ[*31] padāni yat /
GP10bhpc101u:429: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-bhaved[*33] evaṃ yadi tasyāḥ padāni saṃpṛktāni na bhaveyus tāni tu no duḥkhaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:430: [*33] yadi tasyāḥ padāni saṃpṛktāni na bhaveyus tarhi evaṃ kṛṣṇaprāptisādhanaṃ tatpadarajaḥsevanaṃ bhavet |
GP10bhpc101u:431: tāni nu saṃpṛktāni tatpadāni no duḥkhaṃ kurvanti |
GP10bhpc101u:432: tasyāḥ pādarajasā miśritatvāt kṛṣṇapādarajasa iti bhāvaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:433: na lakṣyante padāny atra tasyā nūnaṃ tṛṇāṅkuraiḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:435: tad asaṃpṛktān kevalaṃ kṛṣṇapādareṇūn eva vicinvatyas tān dṛṣṭvā punar atyantaṃ samatapan
GP10bhpc101u:437: khidyatī sujāte sukumāre aṅghritale yasyās tām unninye skandham āropitavān
GP10bhpc101u:442: keśaprasādhanaṃ tv atra kāminyāḥ kāminā kṛtam /
GP10bhpc101u:443: tāni cūḍayatā kāntām upaviṣṭam iha dhruvam //
GP10bhpc101u:445: kāntām adhikṛtya tāni prasūnāni cūḍayatā cūḍānukāreṇa badhnatā dhruvam upaviṣṭam ||BhPC_10,30.33||
GP10bhpc101u:447: kāmināṃ darśayan dainyaṃ strīṇāṃ caiva durātmatām //
GP10bhpc101u:452: akhaṇḍitaḥ strīvibhramair anākṛṣṭo 'pi tathā cet kim iti reme 'ta
GP10bhpc101u:454: sā ca mene tadātmānaṃ variṣṭhaṃ sarvayoṣitām /
GP10bhpc101u:455: hitvā gopīḥ kāmayānā mām asau bhajate priyaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:457: kāmo yānam āgamanasādhanaṃ yāsāṃ tā gopīr hitvā māṃ bhajata iti hetor ātmānaṃ variṣṭhaṃ mene
GP10bhpc101u:458: evam uktaḥ priyām āha skandha āruhyatām iti /
GP10bhpc101u:459: tataś cāntardadhe kṛṣṇaḥ sā vadhūr anvatapyata //
GP10bhpc101u:463: hā nātha ramaṇa preṣṭha kvāsi kvāsi mahābhuja /
GP10bhpc101u:464: dāsyās te kṛpaṇāyā me sakhe darśaya sannidhim //
GP10bhpc101u:470: tato 'viśan vanaṃ candra jyotsnā yāvad vibhāvyate /
GP10bhpc101u:471: tamaḥ praviṣṭam ālakṣya tato nivavṛtuḥ striyaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:472: tatas tayāpi sahitāḥ kṛṣṇānveṣaṇāya vanam aviśan |
GP10bhpc101u:476: evaṃ tam aprāptā api svagṛhān naiva smṛtavatyaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:481_0: kintu pūrvaṃ yatra śrīkṛṣṇena saṅgatir āsīt tad eva kālindyāḥ puliam āgatya kṛṣṇaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:481_1: bhāvayanti dhyāyantīti tathā tāḥ kṛṣṇasyāgamanaṃ kāṅkṣitaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ militāḥ satyaḥ
GP10bhpc101u:482: iti śrīmadbhāgavate mahāpurāṇe daśamaskandhe pūrvārdhe bhāvārthadīpikāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ triṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ **30**
GP10bhpc101u:485: gopya ūcuḥ jayati[*35] te 'dhikaṃ janmanā vrajaḥ śrayata indirā śaśvad atra hi /
GP10bhpc101u:486: dayita dṛśyatāṃ[*36] dikṣu tāvakās tvayi dhṛtāsavas tvāṃ vicinvate //
GP10bhpc101u:487_0: [*35] jayatītyādiślokeṣu prāyaścaturṇāṃ pādānāṃ dvitīyākṣarahalaikyaṃ keṣucit pādeṣu
GP10bhpc101u:488: [*36] tvayā dṛśyatāṃ pratyakṣībhūyatām iti preraṇātyāgenākarmakatvād bhāve
GP10bhpc101u:490: yadvā asmābhir bhavān dṛśyatām iti karmaṇi loṭ |
GP10bhpc101u:492: he dayita, te janmanā vrajo 'dhikaṃ yathā bhavati tathā jayaty utkarṣeṇa vartate |
GP10bhpc101u:493: yasmāt tvam atra jātas tasmad indirā lakṣmīr atra hi śrayate vrajam alaṅkṛtya vartate |
GP10bhpc101u:494: evaṃ vraje sarvasmin modamāne 'tra tu tāvakās tvadīyā gopījanās tvayi tvadartham eva kathañcid dhṛtā asavo yais te tvāṃ vicinvate |
GP10bhpc101u:497: yadvā evaṃ tvayā dṛṣyatām ete vicinvata iti
GP10bhpc101u:499: suratanātha te 'śulkadāsikā varada nighnato neha kiṃ vadhaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:500: [*37] athavā dṛśaiva śulkadāsikāḥ dṛgrūpaśulkenaiva dāsīr api tyāgena mārayataḥ iti yojanā
GP10bhpc101u:501: atra svatantrāṇāṃ bāhūnāṃ vaktṛtvād aparā āhur iti sarvaślokeṣv avatāraṇā,
GP10bhpc101u:503: tatra vicinvantu mama kim iti cet
GP10bhpc101u:505_0: śarad udāśaye śaratkālīne sarasi sādhu jātaṃ samyak jātaṃ yat sarasijaṃ vikasitaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:505_1: padmaṃ tasyodare garbhe yā śrīs tāṃ muṣṇāti haratīti tathā tayā dṛśā netreṇa he suratanātha
GP10bhpc101u:505_2: saṃbhogapate varadābhīṣṭaprada, aśulkadāsikā amūlyadāsīr no nighnato mārayatas te
GP10bhpc101u:505_3: tava tvayā kriyamāṇa iha loke 'yaṃ vadho na bhavati kim |
GP10bhpc101u:506: śastreṇaiva vadho vadhaḥ kiṃ dṛśā vadho na bhavati, kintu bhavaty eva |
GP10bhpc101u:509: tvayā dṛśyatām iti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ sarvatra vākyaśeṣaḥ ||BhPC_31.2||
GP10bhpc101u:511: vṛṣamayātmajād[*38] viśvato bhayād ṛṣabha te vayaṃ rakṣitā muhuḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:514: taccaritram agre vakṣyamāṇam api rāsāt pūrvabhāvīti jñeyam |
GP10bhpc101u:515: kiṃ ca bahubhyo mṛtyubhyaḥ kṛpayā rakṣitvā kimitīdānīṃ dṛśā manmathaṃ preṣya ghātayasīty āhuḥ-viṣeti
GP10bhpc101u:516: he ṛṣabha śreṣṭha, viṣamayāj jalādyo 'pyayo nāśas tasmāt tathā vyālarākṣasād aghāsurād varṣān mārutād vaidyutānalād aśanipātāt vṛṣo 'ṛṣṭas[*39] tasmān mayātmajād vyomād viśvato
GP10bhpc101u:517: 'nyasmād api sarvato bhayāc ca kāliyadamanādinā rakṣitāḥ kim idānīm upekṣasa iti bhāvaḥ
GP10bhpc101u:518: na khalu gopīkānandano bhavān akhiladehinām antarātmadṛk /
GP10bhpc101u:519: vikhanasārthito viśvaguptaye sakha udeyivān sātvatāṃ kule //
GP10bhpc101u:520: [*39] ariṣṭavyomāsurayor vadhasya bhāvitve 'pi gargādimukhāc chrutatvena vipralambapoṣakatvena vā bhūtavan nirdeśaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:521: api ca viśvapālanāyāvatīrṇasya tava bhaktopekṣā 'tyantam anucitety
GP10bhpc101u:523: he sakhe, bhavān khalu niścitaṃ yaśodāsuto na bhavati, kintu sarvaprāṇināṃ buddhisākṣī
GP10bhpc101u:524: nanu sa kiṃ dṛśyo bhavati tatrāhuḥ-vikhanasā brahmaṇā viśvapālanāya prārthitaḥ sansātvatāṃ kule udeyivān udita iti ||BhPC_31.4||
GP10bhpc101u:525: viracitābhayaṃ vṛṣṇidhūrya te caraṇam[*40] īyuṣāṃ saṃsṛter bhayāt /
GP10bhpc101u:526: karasaroruhaṃ kānta[*41] kāmadaṃ śirasi dhehi naḥ śrīkaragraham //
GP10bhpc101u:528: [*41] yadvā kāntaṃ ca tatkāmadaṃ ceti svataḥ sukharūpam abhīṣṭadaṃ ceti
GP10bhpc101u:530: tasmāt tvadbhaktānām asmākam etat prārthanācatuṣṭayaṃ saṃpādayety
GP10bhpc101u:533_0: caraṇam īyuṣāṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptānāṃ prāṇināṃ viracitaṃ dattam abhayaṃ yena tat tathā
GP10bhpc101u:533_1: he kānta, kāmadaṃ varadaṃ tathā śriyaḥ karaṃ gṛhṇātīti tathā tad bhavatkarasaroruhaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:533_2: na śirasi dehi vrajajanārtihan vīra yoṣitāṃ nijajanasmayadhvaṃsanasmita /
GP10bhpc101u:534: bhaja sakhe bhavatkiṅkarīḥ[*42] sma no jalaruhānanaṃ cāru darśaya //
GP10bhpc101u:538: he vrajajanārtihan he vīra, nija janānāṃ yaḥ smayo garvas tasya dhvaṃsanaṃ nāśakaṃ smitaṃ yasya tathābhūta he sakhe, bhavatkiṅkarīr no 'smān bhaja āśraya |
GP10bhpc101u:540: prathamaṃ tāvaj jalaruhānanaṃ cāru yoṣitāṃ no darśaya ||BhPC_31.6||
GP10bhpc101u:542: phaṇiphaṇārpitaṃ[*43] te padāmbujaṃ kṛṇu kuceṣu naḥ kṛndhi hṛcchayam //
GP10bhpc101u:543: [*43] phaṇinaḥ phaṇāsv arpaṇamātreṇa tadviṣadarpasyeva hṛdi sparśamātreṇa
GP10bhpc101u:544: kandarpasya nāśo na duṣkara iti bhāvaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:545_0: aviśeṣeṇa praṇatāṇāṃ dehināṃ pāpakarśanaṃ pāpahantṛ tṛṇacarān paśūn apy anu gacchati
GP10bhpc101u:545_1: kṛpayeti tathā saubhāgyena śriyo niketanaṃ vīryātirekeṇa phaṇinaḥ phanāsv arpitaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:545_2: te padāmbujaṃ naḥ kuceṣu kṛṇu kuru |
GP10bhpc101u:549: vidhikarīr[*44] imā vīra muhyatīr adharasīdhunāpyāyayasva naḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:550: [*44] yadvā giraiva vidhikarīr adhunā virahāt saṃmuhyatīḥ imāḥ pratyakṣāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:551: he puṣkarekṣaṇa, tavaiva madhurayā girā valgūni vākyāni yasyāṃ tayā budhānāṃ manojñayā hṛdyayā gambhīrayety arthaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:552: muhyatīr imā no vidhikarīḥ kiṅkarīr adharasīdhunā āpyāyayasva saṃjīvayeti ||BhPC_31.8||
GP10bhpc101u:553: tava kathāmṛtaṃ[*45] taptajīvanaṃ kavibhir īḍitaṃ kalmaṣāpaham /
GP10bhpc101u:554: śravaṇamaṅgalaṃ śrīmad ātataṃ bhuvi gṛṇanti te bhūridā janāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:555: [*45] yadvā santaptā āhuḥ-tava kathā eva ṃrtaṃ mṛtiḥ saivoddīpanavidhayāsmān mārayati |
GP10bhpc101u:556: tathā taptajīvanaṃ tapte taile jīvanam ivety arthaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:557: tathā ca ye 'smat purato gṛṇanti te bhūridā mahāghātakāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:560: kiṃ ca asmākaṃ tvadvirahe prāptam eva mataṇaṃ kintu tvatkathāmṛtaṃ pāyayadbhiḥ sukṛtibhir vañcitam ity āhuḥ-taveti |
GP10bhpc101u:564: prasiddhāmṛtād utkarṣam āhuḥ-kavibhir brahmavidbhir apīḍitaṃ stutam |
GP10bhpc101u:572: evaṃbhūtaṃ tvatkathāmṛtam ātataṃ yathā bhavati tathā ye bhuvi gṛṇanti nirūpayanti te janā bhūridā bahudātāraḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:574: yadvā evaṃbhūtaṃ tvatkathāmṛtaṃ ye bhuvi gṛṇanti te bhūridāḥ pūrvajanmasu bahu dattavantaḥ sukṛtina ity arthaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:575: etad uktaṃ bhavati-ye kevalaṃ kathāmṛtaṃ gṛṇanti te 'pi tāvad atidhanyāḥ kiṃ punar ye tvāṃ paśyanti, ataḥ prārthayāmahe tvayā dṛśyatām iti ||BhPC_31.9||
GP10bhpc101u:576: prahasitaṃ priya premavīkṣaṇaṃ viharaṇaṃ ca te dhyānamaṅgalam[*46] /
GP10bhpc101u:577: rahasi saṃvido yā hṛdi spṛśaḥ kuhaka no manaḥ kṣobhayanti hi //
GP10bhpc101u:580: nanu matkathāśravaṇenaiva nirvṛtā bhavata kiṃ maddarśanena, na,
GP10bhpc101u:581: tvadvilāsakṣubhitacittā vayaṃ tatrāpi śāntiṃ na vindāma ity
GP10bhpc101u:583: he priya, kuhaka kapaṭa, saṃvidaḥ saṅketanarmāṇi ||BhPC_31.10||
GP10bhpc101u:584: calasi yad vrajāc cārayan paśūn nalinasundaraṃ nātha te padam /
GP10bhpc101u:585: śilatṛṇāṅkuraiḥ sīdatīti naḥ kalilatāṃ manaḥ kānta gacchati //
GP10bhpc101u:586: kiṃ ca tvayi vayam atipremārdracittās tvaṃ punar asmāsu kena hetunā kapaṭam ācarasīty āhuḥ ślokadvayena-calasīti |
GP10bhpc101u:587: he nātha he kānta, yat yadā vrajāc calasi paśūṃś cārayaṃs tadā tan nalinasundaraṃ komalaṃ te padaṃ śilaiḥ kaṇiśais tṛṇair aṅkuraiś ca sīdati kliśyed iti no manaḥ kalilatām
GP10bhpc101u:591: ghanarajasvalaṃ darśayan muhur manasi naḥ smaraṃ vīra yacchasi //
GP10bhpc101u:592_0: tvaṃ tu dinaparikṣaye sāyaṃ kāle nīlakuntalair āvṛtaṃ ghanarajasvalaṃ gorajaś churitaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:592_1: vanaruhānanam alimālākulaparāgacchuritapadmatulyam ānanaṃ bibhrat tac ca muhur muhur
GP10bhpc101u:592_2: darśayan no manasi kevalaṃ smaraṃ[*47] yacchasy arpayasi |
GP10bhpc101u:593: na tu saṅgaṃ dadāsīti kapaṭas tvam iti bhāvaḥ ||BhPC_31.12||
GP10bhpc101u:596: caraṇapaṅkajaṃ śantamaṃ ca te ramaṇa naḥ staneṣv arpayādhihan //
GP10bhpc101u:598: ato 'dhunā kapaṭaṃ vihāyaivaṃ kurv iti prārthayanti ślokadvayena-praṇatakāmadam iti |
GP10bhpc101u:599: he adhihan he ramaṇa, padmajena brahmaṇārcitam āpadi dhyeyaṃ dhyānamātreṇāpannivartakaṃ śantamaṃ ca sevāsamaye 'pi sukhatamaṃ te caraṇapaṅkajaṃ kāmatāpaśāntaye naḥ staneṣv
GP10bhpc101u:602: itararāgavismāraṇaṃ nṛṇāṃ[*49] vitara vīra nas te 'dharāmṛtam //
GP10bhpc101u:603: [*49] nṛṇām iti puṃsām api, kim uta nārīṇām |
GP10bhpc101u:604: api ca he vīra, te 'dharāmṛtaṃ no vitara dehi |
GP10bhpc101u:605: svaritena nāditena veṇunā suṣṭhu cumbitam iti nādāmṛtavāsitam iti bhāvaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:606: itararāgavismāraṇaṃ nṛṇām itareṣu sārvabhaumādisukheṣu rāgam icchāṃ vismārayati vilāpayatīti tathā tat ||BhPC_31.14||
GP10bhpc101u:607: aṭati yad bhavān ahni kānanaṃ truṭir yugāyate tvām apaśyatām /
GP10bhpc101u:608: kuṭilakuntalaṃ śrīmukhaṃ ca te jaḍa[*50] udīkṣatāṃ pakṣmakṛd dṛśām //
GP10bhpc101u:610: yaḥ pakṣmāṇi kṛntati sa nimīlanābhāvasaṃpādaka eva ajaḍo rasajñaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:611: kiṃ vā svadṛśāṃ pakṣmacchideva ajaḍaḥ udīkṣatāṃ uccaiḥ paśyatu |
GP10bhpc101u:612: vayaṃ tu pakṣmapihitadṛśo jaḍāḥ kiṃ paśyāmeti darśane 'pi vidhāna duḥkham iti bhāvaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:613: kiṃ ca kṣaṇam api tvadadarśane duḥkhaṃ darśane ca sukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvasaṅgaparityāgena yataya iva vayaṃ truṭiḥ kṣaṇārdham api yugavad bhavati |
GP10bhpc101u:615: punaś ca kathañcid dinānte te tava śrīman mukham uduccair īkṣamānānāṃ teṣāṃ dṛṣāṃ pakṣmakṛd brahmā jaḍo manda eva |
GP10bhpc101u:616: nimeṣamātram apy antaram asahyam iti darśane sukham uktam ||BhPC_31.15||
GP10bhpc101u:618: gatividas tavodgītamohitāḥ kitava yoṣitaḥ kas tyajen niśi //
GP10bhpc101u:619: tasmāt he acyuta, patīn sutān anvayāṃs tatsaṃbandhino bhrātṝn bāndhavāṃś
GP10bhpc101u:623: āgamanaṃ jānataḥ, gītagatīr vā jānataḥ, gativido vayaṃ vā |
GP10bhpc101u:624: tavodgītenoccair gītena mohitāḥ he kitava śaṭha, evaṃbhūtā yoṣito niśi
GP10bhpc101u:625: svayam āgatās tvām ṛte kas tyajet |
GP10bhpc101u:628: bṛhaduraḥ śriyo vīkṣya dhāma te muhur atispṛhā[*52] muhyate manaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:634: yadvā spṛheti saṃpadāditvād bhāve kvipi tṛtīyā |
GP10bhpc101u:637: atas tvayā tyaktānām asmākaṃ prāktanatvaddarśananidānahṛdrogasya tvatsaṅgatyaiva cikitsāṃ kurvityāśayenāhur dvayena-rahasīti |
GP10bhpc101u:638: śriyo dhāma te bṛhad viśālam uraś ca vīkṣyātispṛhā bhavati |
GP10bhpc101u:639: tathā ca muhur muhur mano muhyati ||BhPC_31.17||
GP10bhpc101u:640: vrajavanaukasāṃ[*53] vyaktir aṅga te vṛjinahantry alaṃ viśvamaṅgalam /
GP10bhpc101u:641: tyaja manāk ca nas tvatspṛhātmanāṃ svajanahṛdrujāṃ yan niṣūdanam //
GP10bhpc101u:643: tava ca vyaktir abhivyaktir vrajavanaukasāṃ sarveṣām aviśeṣeṇa vṛjinahantrī duḥkhanirasanīti viśvamaṅgalaṃ sarvamaṅgalarūpā ca |
GP10bhpc101u:644: atas tvatspṛhātmanāṃ tvatspṛhārūḍhamanasāṃ no manāg īṣat kim api tyaja muñca |
GP10bhpc101u:647: svajanahṛdrogāṇāṃ yad atigopyaṃ niṣūdanaṃ nivartakam auṣadhaṃ tat tvam eva vetasīti gūḍhābhiprāyam
GP10bhpc101u:648: yat te sujātacaraṇāmburuhaṃ staneṣu bhītāḥ śanaiḥ priya dadhīmahi karkaśeṣu /
GP10bhpc101u:649: tenāṭavīm aṭasi tad vyathate na kiṃ svit kūrpādibhir bhramati dhīr bhavadāyuṣāṃ naḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:651: he priya, yat te tava sukumāraṃ padābjaṃ kaṭhineṣu kuceṣu saṃmardanaśaṅkitāḥ śanair dadhīmahi[*54]
GP10bhpc101u:654: “nayasi” iti pāṭhe paśūn vā kāñcid anyāṃ vā ātmānam eva vā nayasi prāpayasi |
GP10bhpc101u:655_0: tat tataḥ tat padāmbujaṃ vā kūrpādibhiḥ sūkṣmapāṣāṇādibhiḥ kiṃ svin na vyathate kathaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:655_1: nu nāma na vyatheteti bhavān[*55] evāyur jīvanaṃ yāsāṃ tāsāṃ no dhīr bhramati muhyatīti ||BhPC_31.19 ||
GP10bhpc101u:659: ittham eva ca “tvayi dhṛtāsavaḥ” ity upakramo 'pi
GP10bhpc101u:660: iti śrīmadbhāgavate mahāpurāṇe daśamaskandhe pūrvārdhe bhāvārthadīpikāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ ekatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ **31**
GP10bhpc101u:664: sad ayaṃ nandayan gopīr udgato nandanandanaḥ // 2 //
GP10bhpc101u:665: iti gopyaḥ pragāyantyaḥ pralapantyaś ca citradhā /
GP10bhpc101u:669: citradhā anekadhā susvaram uccaiḥ kṛṣṇadarśane lālasātispṛhā yāsāṃ tāḥ ||BhPC_10,32.1||
GP10bhpc101u:672: sākṣān manmathamanmatho jaganmohanasya kāmasyāpi manasy udbhūtaḥ kāmaḥ sākṣāt tasyāpi mohaka ity arthaḥ ||BhPC_10,32.2||
GP10bhpc101u:674: uttasthur yugapat sarvās tanvaḥ prāṇam ivāgatam //
GP10bhpc101u:681_0: bhrukuṭiṃ bhruvam ābadhya kuṭilīkṛtya premasaṃrambheṇa praṇayakopāveśena vihvalā
GP10bhpc101u:681_1: vivaśā daṣṭādharoṣṭhā kaṭāḥ kaṭākṣās tair ye ākṣepāḥ paribhavās tais tāḍayantīvaikṣat ||BhPC_10,32.6 ||
GP10bhpc101u:683: āpītam api nātṛpyat santas[*56] taccaraṇaṃ yathā //
GP10bhpc101u:685: animiṣantībhyām animīlantībhyāṃ dṛgbhyām āpītam api samyag dṛṣṭam api punaḥ punar juṣāṇā nātṛpyat
GP10bhpc101u:686: taṃ kācin netrarandhreṇa hṛdi kṛtya nimīlya ca /
GP10bhpc101u:691: jahur virahajaṃ tāpaṃ prājñaṃ prāpya yathā janāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:692: prājñaṃ īśvaraṃ prāpya yathā mumukṣavo janāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:693: yadvā prājñaṃ brahmajñaṃ prāpya yathā saṃsāriṇaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:694: yadvā prājñaṃ sauṣuptaṃ[*58] prāpya yathā viśvataijasāvasthā jīvāḥ ||BhPC_10,32.9||
GP10bhpc101u:700: yadvā puruṣo 'nuśāyī prakṛtyādyupādhibhir vṛto yathā 'dhikaṃ virocate tadvat ||BhPC_10,32.10||
GP10bhpc101u:701: tāḥ samādāya kālindyā nirviśya[*59] pulinaṃ vibhuḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:704: vikasatkundamandāraiḥ surabhir yo 'nilas tasmāt ṣaṭpadā yasmiṃs tat
GP10bhpc101u:707: śaraccandrāṃśūnāṃ sandohaiḥ samūhair dhvastaṃ doṣātamo rātrigataṃ tamo yasmiṃs tat |
GP10bhpc101u:709: hastarūpais taralais taraṅgair ācitā āstṛtā komalā vālukā yasmin |
GP10bhpc101u:710: evaṃbhūtaṃ pulinaṃ tāḥ samādāya nirviśya tābhir vṛto 'dhikaṃ vyarocateti pūrveṇānvayaḥ ||BhPC_10,32.12||
GP10bhpc101u:712: svair uttarīyaiḥ kucakuṅkumāṅkitair acīk pann āsanam ātmabandhave //
GP10bhpc101u:713: tāś ca manorathānām antaṃ yayuḥ pūrṇakāmā babhūvuḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:715_0: ayam arthaḥ-yathā karmakāṇḍe śrutayaḥ parameśvaram apaśyantyas tat tatkāmānubandhair
GP10bhpc101u:715_1: apūrṇā iva bhavanti, jñānakāṇḍe tu parameśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā tadāhlādapūrṇāḥ kāmānubandhaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:716: āptakāmā api premṇā tam abhajann ity āha-svair iti |
GP10bhpc101u:724: gopīsabhāgatas tābhiḥ saṃmānitaḥ san cakāsa śuśubhe |
GP10bhpc101u:725: trailokye yā lakṣmīḥ śobhā tasyā ekam eva padaṃ sthānaṃ tadvapur dadhad darśayan
GP10bhpc101u:729: sahāsalīlekṣaṇena vibhramo vilāso yasyāṃ tayā bhruvopalakṣitāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:731: gopya ūcuḥ bhajato 'nubhajanty eka eka etadviparyayam /
GP10bhpc101u:732: nobhayāṃś[*63] ca bhajanty eka etan no brūhi sādhu bhoḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:734: tatra bhagavato 'kṛtajñatāṃ tadvacanenaivāpādayitukāmā gūḍhābhiprāyā lokavṛttāntam iva pṛcchanti-bhajata iti |
GP10bhpc101u:738: kecid etad viparyayaṃ yathā bhavati tathā |
GP10bhpc101u:742: śrībhagavān uvāca mitho bhajanti ye sakhyaḥ svārthaikāntodyamā hi te /
GP10bhpc101u:743: na tatra sauhṛdaṃ dharmaḥ svārthārthaṃ tad dhi nānyathā[*65] //
GP10bhpc101u:746: he sakhyaḥ, upakārapratyupakāratayā ye mitho bhajanti te 'nyaṃ na bhajanti kiṃ tv ātmānam eva |
GP10bhpc101u:748: hi yasmāt svārtha[*66] evaikānta udyamo yeṣāṃ te |
GP10bhpc101u:749: tatra ca na[*67] sauhṛdam ato na sukhaṃ, na ca dharmo dṛṣṭoddeśād gomahiṣyādibhajanavad ity
GP10bhpc101u:752: bhajanty abhajato ye vai karuṇāḥ pitaro yathā /
GP10bhpc101u:756: ye tv abhajato bhajanti te dvividhāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:758: tatra tu yathākramaṃ dharmakāmau bhavata ity āha-bhajanty abhajata iti ||BhPC_10,32.18||
GP10bhpc101u:759: bhajato 'pi na vai kecid bhajanty abhajataḥ kutaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:763: eke ātmārāmā aparāgdṛśaḥ, kecid āptakāmā viṣayadarśino 'pi pūrṇakāmatvena
GP10bhpc101u:764: bhogecchārahitāḥ, anye 'kṛtajñā mūḍhāḥ, anye tu gurudruho 'tikaṭhināḥ “sa
GP10bhpc101u:765: pitā yas tu poṣakaḥ” iti nyāyād upakartā gurutulyas tasmai druhyantīti
GP10bhpc101u:767: nāhaṃ tu sakhyo bhajato 'pi jantūn bhajāmy amīṣām anuvṛttivṛttaye /
GP10bhpc101u:768: yathādhano labdhadhane vinaṣṭe taccintayānyan nibhṛto na veda //
GP10bhpc101u:769: atra caramakoṭigatam ātmānaṃ matvā, akṣisaṃkocaiḥ parasparaṃ gūḍhasmitamukhīs tā dṛṣṭvā āha-nāhaṃ tv iti |
GP10bhpc101u:770: he sakhyaḥ, ahaṃ teṣāṃ madhye na ko 'pi, kiṃ tu paramakāruṇikaḥ paramasuhṛc ca |
GP10bhpc101u:772: amīṣāṃ bhajatām anuvṛttivṛtaye nirantaradhyānapravṛttyarthaṃ tān na bhajāmi |
GP10bhpc101u:777: evaṃ madarthojjhitalokavedasvānāṃ hi vo mayy anuvṛttaye 'balāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:778: mayā parokṣaṃ bhajatā tirohitaṃ māsūyituṃ mārhatha tat priyaṃ priyāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:779: evaṃ madarthojjhitalokavedasvānāṃ madarthe ujjhito loko yuktāyuktāpratīkṣaṇāt, vedaś ca dharmādharmāpratīkṣaṇāt, svā jñātayaś ca
GP10bhpc101u:780: snehatyāgāt yābhis tāsāṃ vo yuṣmākaṃ parokṣam adarśanaṃ yathā bhavati tathā bhajatā yuṣmat premālāpān śṛṇvataiva tirohitam antardhānena sthitam |
GP10bhpc101u:781: tat tasmāt he abalā he priyāḥ, mā mām[*69] asūyituṃ doṣāropeṇa draṣṭuṃ
GP10bhpc101u:784: tathāpi priyaṃ mallakṣaṇam asūyituṃ mārhatheti mā |
GP10bhpc101u:786: na pāraye 'haṃ niravadyasaṃyujāṃ svasādhukṛtyaṃ vibudhāyuṣāpi vaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:787: yā mābhajan durjaragehaśṛṅkhalāḥ[*70] saṃvṛścya tad vaḥ pratiyātu sādhunā //
GP10bhpc101u:789: āstām idaṃ, paramarthaṃ tu śṛṇutety āha-neti |
GP10bhpc101u:790: niravadyā saṃyuk saṃyogo yāsāṃ tāsāṃ vo vibudhānām[*71] āyuṣāpi cirakāle 'pi svīyaṃ sādhu
GP10bhpc101u:791: pratyupakāraṃ kartuṃ na pāraye na śaknomi |
GP10bhpc101u:793: yā bhavatyo durjarā ajarā yā gehaśṛṅkhalās tāḥ saṃvṛścya niḥśeṣaṃ chittvā mā mām abhajaṃs tāsām |
GP10bhpc101u:795: tasmād vo yuṣmākam eva sādhunā sādhukṛtyena tat yuṣmat sādhu kṛtyaṃ pratiyātu pratikṛtaṃ bhavatu
GP10bhpc101u:796: yuṣmat sauśīlyenaiva mamānṛṇyaṃ, na tu matkṛtapratyupakāreṇety arthaḥ ||BhPC_10,32.22||
GP10bhpc101u:797: [*71] yadvā vigato budho gaṇanābhijño yasmāt tenānantenāyuṣāpi |
GP10bhpc101u:798: iti śrīmadbhāgavate mahāpurāṇe daśamaskandhe pūrvārdhe bhāvārthadīpikāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ dvātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ **32**
GP10bhpc101u:801: śrīśuka uvāca itthaṃ bhagavato gopyaḥ śrutvā vācaḥ supeśalāḥ[*72] /
GP10bhpc101u:804: tat tadā aṅga he rājan, yadvā tasya bhagavato 'ṅgena vapuṣā karacaraṇādyavayavair vopacitāḥ samṛddhā āśiṣo yāsāṃ[*73] tāḥ
GP10bhpc101u:805: [*73] yadvā tāsāṃ gopīnām aṅgair upacitā āśiṣo yasya |
GP10bhpc101u:808: rāsakrīḍāṃ rāso[*74] nāma bahunartakīyukto nṛtyaviśeṣas tāṃ krīḍām |
GP10bhpc101u:809: anyonyam ābaddhāḥ saṃgrathitā bāhavo yais taiḥ saha ||BhPC_10,33.2||
GP10bhpc101u:811: nartakīnāṃ bhaved rāso maṇḍalībhūya nartanam //” iti rāsalakṣaṇam |
GP10bhpc101u:813: yogeśvareṇa kṛṣṇena[*75] tāsāṃ madhye dvayor dvayoḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:818: tatsāhityam abhinayena darśayati-rāsotsava ity akṣaracatuṣṭayādhikena sārdhena |
GP10bhpc101u:819: tāsāṃ maṇḍalarūpeṇāvasthitānāṃ dvayor dvayor madhye praviṣṭena tenaiva kaṇṭhe gṛhītānām ubhayata āliṅgitānām |
GP10bhpc101u:821: yaṃ sarvāḥ striyaḥ svanikaṭaṃ mām evāśliṣṭavān iti manyeraṃs tena etad arthaṃ dvayor dvayor madhye praviṣṭenety arthaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:823: sarvasannihitatve vā kutaḥ svaikanikaṭatvābhimānas tāsām ity ata
GP10bhpc101u:828: tāvat tatkṣaṇam evautsukyavyāptamanasāṃ sastrīkāṇāṃ devānāṃ vimānaśataiḥ saṅkulaṃ saṅkīrṇaṃ nabho babhūva ||BhPC_10,33.4||
GP10bhpc101u:831: tat tasya bhagavataḥ śrīkṛṣṇasyāmalaṃ nirmalaṃ yaśo jagur iti ||BhPC_10,33.5||
GP10bhpc101u:838: mahāmarakato nīlamaṇir iva haimānāṃ maṇīnāṃ madhye madhye tābhiḥ svarṇavarṇābhir āśliṣṭābhiḥ śuśubhe |
GP10bhpc101u:840: pādanyāsair bhujavidhutibhiḥ sasmitair bhrūvilāsair bhajyan madhyaiś calakucapaṭaiḥ kuṇḍalair gaṇḍalolaiḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:841: svidyanmukhyaḥ kabararaśanāgranthayaḥ kṛṣṇavadhvo gāyantyas taṃ taḍita iva tā meghacakre virejuḥ
GP10bhpc101u:842: sa yathā tābhiḥ śuśubhe, tathā tā api tena virejur ity āha-pādanyāsair iti
GP10bhpc101u:843: | bhujavidhutibhiḥ karacālanair bhajyamānair madhyaiś caladbhiḥ kucaiś ca paṭaiś ca |
GP10bhpc101u:845: svidyan mukhyaḥ svidyanti svedam udgiranti mukhāni yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:846: kabareṣu raśanāsu ca granthayo dṛḍhā yāsām |
GP10bhpc101u:847: yadvā teṣu tāsu cāgranthayaḥ, śithilagranthaya ity arthaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:848: tatra nānāmūrtiḥ kṛṣṇo meghacakram iva, tās tu bahuvidhās taḍita iva svedas
GP10bhpc101u:849: tuṣāra iva, gītaṃ garjitam eveti yathāsaṃbhavamūhyam ||BhPC_10,33.8||
GP10bhpc101u:860: unninye pūjitā tena prīyatā sādhu sādhv iti /
GP10bhpc101u:861: tad eva dhruvam unninye tasyai mānaṃ ca bahv adāt //
GP10bhpc101u:864: prīyamāṇena saṃmānitā tajjāty unnayanam eva dhruvaṃ dhruvākhyaṃ tālaviśeṣaṃ kṛtvā unninye unnītavatī ||BhPC_10,33.10||
GP10bhpc101u:867: evaṃ nṛtyagītādinā śrīkṛṣṇasaṃmānitānāṃ tāsām atiprītivilasitaṃ vṛttam
GP10bhpc101u:869: ślathanti valayāni mallikāś ca yasyāḥ sā ||BhPC_10,33.11||
GP10bhpc101u:875: nāṭyena nṛtyena vikṣiptayoś cañcalayoḥ kuṇḍalayos[*77] tviṣeṇa tviṣā maṇḍitaṃ gaṇḍaṃ kapolaṃ tathābhūte svagaṇḍe saṃdadhatyāḥ saṃyojayantyāḥ
GP10bhpc101u:876: [*77] nṛtyena vikṣipte cañcale kuṇḍale ca svābhāvikī gaṇḍatviṭ ca tatsamāhāras tviṣaṃ tena maṇḍitam iti |
GP10bhpc101u:880: kūjatī nūpure mekhalā ca yasyāḥ sā ||BhPC_10,33.14||
GP10bhpc101u:883: evam anyā api gopyo yathā yathaṃ nānāvibhramair vijahrur ity āha-gopya iti
GP10bhpc101u:885: gopyaḥ samaṃ bhagavatā nanṛtuḥ svakeśasrastasrajo bhramaragāyakarāsagoṣṭhyām //
GP10bhpc101u:886: tatra vādakeṣu gāyakeṣu gandharvakinnarādiṣu rasāveśena muhyatsu cānyām eva vādyādi-sampattiṃ darśayan rāsasaṃbhramam āha-karṇotpalair iti |
GP10bhpc101u:887: karṇotpalaiś cālakaviṭaṅkair alakālaṅkṛtaiḥ kapolaiś ca gharmaiś ca vaktreṣu śrīḥ śobhā yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:889: valayanūpuraghoṣair vādyair vāditraiḥ svakeśebhyaḥ srastāḥ srajo yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:890: etena tālagatisaṃtuṣṭāḥ keśāḥ saśiraḥkampaṃ pādeṣu puṣpavṛṣṭim ivākurvann ity utprekṣitam
GP10bhpc101u:896: yathā gopyo nānāvibhramair bhagavatā saha vijahrur evaṃ bhagavān api svavilāsais tābhiḥ saha rema ity āha-evam iti |
GP10bhpc101u:898: svapratibimbair vibhramaḥ krīḍā yasya sa iva |
GP10bhpc101u:899: anenaitad darśitam-svīyam eva sarvakalākauśalaṃ saugandhyalāvaṇyamādhuryādi ca tāsu sañcārya tābhiḥ saha reme yathārbhakaḥ svapratibimbair iti ||BhPC_10,33.17||
GP10bhpc101u:901: nāñjaḥ prativyoḍhum alaṃ vrajastriyo visrastamālābharaṇāḥ kurūdvaha //
GP10bhpc101u:902: tās tu bhagavadvilāsair ākulā babhūvur ity āha-tadaṅgeti |
GP10bhpc101u:903: tasyāṅgasaṅgena prakṛṣṭām utprītis tayā ākulāny avaśānīndriyāṇi yāsāṃ tāḥ viślathabandhān keśādīn añjasā[*78] prativyoḍhuṃ yathāpūrvaṃ dhartuṃ nālaṃ na samarthā
GP10bhpc101u:905: visrastā mālā ābharaṇāni ca yāsāṃ tāḥ ||BhPC_10,33.18||
GP10bhpc101u:909: na kevalaṃ tā evākulendriyāḥ kintu devyo 'pīty āha-kṛṣṇavikrīḍitam iti |
GP10bhpc101u:911: anenaitat sūcitam-śaśāṅkena vismitena gatau vismṛtāyā tataḥ prāktanāḥ sarve 'pi grahās tatra tatraiva tasthus tataś cātidīrghāsu rātriṣu yathāsukhaṃ vijahrur iti ||BhPC_10,33.19||
GP10bhpc101u:913: reme sa bhagavāṃs tābhir ātmārāmo 'pi līlayā //
GP10bhpc101u:916: nandagopasutaṃ devi patiṃ me kuru te namaḥ // “[*79] iti pratyekaṃ tābhiḥ
GP10bhpc101u:917: prārthanād bhagavatāpi-”yātābalā vrajaṃ siddhā mayemā raṃsyatha kṣapāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:918: “[*80] iti tathaiva pratiśrutatvāt tāvantam ātmānaṃ kṛtvā reme iti |
GP10bhpc101u:927: mānaṃ dadhatya ṛṣabhasya jaguḥ kṛtāni puṇyāni tatkararuhasparśapramodāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:929_0: sphuratāṃ svarṇakuṇḍalānāṃ kuntalānāṃ ca tviṣā gaṇḍeṣu yā śrīs tayā sudhitenāmṛtāyitena
GP10bhpc101u:929_1: hāsasahitena nirīkṣaṇena ca ṛṣabhasya patyuḥ kṛṣṇasya mānaṃ dadhatyaḥ pūjāṃ kurvatyas
GP10bhpc101u:929_2: tatkarmāṇi jaguḥ tasya kararuhair nakhaiḥ sparśena pramodo yāsāṃ tāḥ ||BhPC_10,33.22 ||
GP10bhpc101u:930: tābhir yutaḥ śramam apohitum aṅgasaṅgaghṛṣṭasrajaḥ sa[*82]
GP10bhpc101u:932: gandharvapālibhir anudruta āviśad vāḥ śrānto gajībhir ibharāḍ iva bhinnasetuḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:935_0: tāsām aṅgasaṅgena ghṛṣṭā saṃmarditā yā srak tasyāḥ ata eva tāsāṃ kucakuṅkumena rañjitāyāḥ
GP10bhpc101u:935_1: saṃbandhibhir gandharvapālibhir gandharvapā gandharvapataya iva gāyanto yo 'layas
GP10bhpc101u:935_2: tair anudruto 'nugataḥ sa kṛṣṇo vāḥ udakam āviśat |
GP10bhpc101u:937: so 'mbhasy alaṃ yuvatibhiḥ pariṣicyamānaḥ premṇekṣitaḥ[*83] prahasatībhir itas tato 'ṅga /
GP10bhpc101u:938: vaimānikaiḥ kusumavarṣibhir īdyamāno reme svayaṃ svaratir[*84] atra gajendralīlaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:940: [*84] svaratiḥ ātmārāmo 'pi, yadvā svāsu tāsu ratir yasya, kiṃ vā svā
GP10bhpc101u:944: cacāra bhṛṅgapramadāgaṇāvṛto yathā madacyud dviradaḥ kareṇubhiḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:946: yamunāyā upavane jalasthalaprasūnānāṃ gandho yasmiṃs tenānilena juṣṭāni diśāṃ taṭāny antā yasmin |
GP10bhpc101u:947: yadvā diśaś ca taṭaṃ sthalaṃ ca yasminn upavane |
GP10bhpc101u:954: śaratkāvyakathārasāśrayāḥ śaradi bhavāḥ kāvyeṣu kathyamānā ye rasās teṣām āśrayabhūtā niśāḥ
GP10bhpc101u:956: śṛṅgārarasāśrayāḥ śaradi[*85] prasiddhāḥ kāvyeṣu yāḥ kathās tāḥ siṣeve iti
GP10bhpc101u:957: | evam apy ātmany evāvaruddhaḥ saurataś caramadhātur na tu skhalito
GP10bhpc101u:959: [*85] śaratkāvyakathāḥ śaradi sarvadeśakālakavibhir yāvatyo varṇayituṃ śakyante tāvatīḥ kathāḥ siṣeve ācacāra |
GP10bhpc101u:964: na cedam adharmamātraṃ kalañja-bhakṣaṇādivat kintu mahāsāhasam ity
GP10bhpc101u:967: kim abhiprāya etan naḥ saṃśayaṃ chindhi suvrata //
GP10bhpc101u:968: āptakāmasya nāyam adharma iti ced yady evaṃ kāmābhāvān ninditaṃ kenābhiprāyeṇa kṛtavān iti pṛcchati-āptakāma iti ||BhPC_10,33.29||
GP10bhpc101u:969: śrīśuka uvāca dharmavyatikramo dṛṣṭa īśvarāṇāṃ[*86] ca sāhasam /
GP10bhpc101u:970: tejīyasāṃ na doṣāya vahneḥ[*87] sarvabhujo yathā //
GP10bhpc101u:973: parameśvare kaimutikanyāyena parihartuṃ sāmānyato mahatāṃ vṛttam
GP10bhpc101u:976: tac ca teṣāṃ tejasvināṃ doṣāya na bhavatīti ||BhPC_10,33.30||
GP10bhpc101u:977: naitat samācarej jātu manasāpi hy anīśvaraḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:978: vinaśyaty ācaran mauḍhyād yathā rudro 'bdhijaṃ viṣam //
GP10bhpc101u:979: tarhi “yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhaḥ” iti nyāyenānyo 'pi kuryād ity āśaṅkyāha-naitad iti |
GP10bhpc101u:980: anīśvaro dehādiparatantraḥ yathā rudravyatirikto viṣam ācaran bhakṣayan ||BhPC_10,33.31||
GP10bhpc101u:982: teṣāṃ yat svavacoyuktaṃ buddhimāṃs tat samācaret //
GP10bhpc101u:983: kathaṃ tarhi sadācārasya prāmāṇyam ata āha-īśvarāṇām iti |
GP10bhpc101u:984: teṣāṃ vacaḥ satyam, atas tad uktam ācared eva |
GP10bhpc101u:986: ataḥ svavacoyuktaṃ teṣāṃ vacasā yadyad yuktam aviruddhaṃ tattad evācaret
GP10bhpc101u:989: nanu tarhi te 'pi kim evaṃ sāhasam ācaranti tatrāha-kuśaleti |
GP10bhpc101u:990: prārabdhakarmakṣapaṇamātram eva teṣāṃ kṛtyaṃ nānyad ity arthaḥ
GP10bhpc101u:993: [*88] yadā īśitavyānāṃ niyamyānāṃ nirahaṅkāriṇāṃ jīvānāṃ kuśalākuśalānvayo
GP10bhpc101u:994: na vidyate tadā tiryagādirūpāṇām akhilasattvānām īśitur niyantuḥ kuśalākuśalānvayo na vidyata iti kim u vaktavyam iti pūrvaślokasthena “na
GP10bhpc101u:997: kuśalākuśalānvayo na vidyata iti kiṃ punar vaktavyam ity arthaḥ ||BhPC_10,33.34||
GP10bhpc101u:999: svairaṃ caranti munayo 'pi na nahyamānās tasyecchayāttavapuṣaḥ kuta eva bandhaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1000: etad eva sphuṭīkaroti-yasya pādapaṅkajaparāgasya niṣevaṇena tṛptāḥ, yadvā yasya pādapaṅkajaparāge niṣevā yeṣāṃ te ca te tṛptāś ceti bhaktā ity
GP10bhpc101u:1002: tathā jñāninaś ca na nahyamānā bandhanam aprāptavantaḥ
GP10bhpc101u:1003: gopīnāṃ tatpatīnāṃ ca sarveṣām eva dehinām /
GP10bhpc101u:1005: paradāratvaṃ gopīnām aṅgīkṛtya parihṛtam, idānīṃ bhagavataḥ sarvāntaryāmiṇaḥ paradārasevā nāma na kācid ity āha-gopīnām iti |
GP10bhpc101u:1007: caraty adhyakṣo buddhyādisākṣī sa eva krīḍanena dehabhāk, na tv asmadāditulyo yena doṣaḥ syād iti ||BhPC_10,33.36||
GP10bhpc101u:1009: bhajate tādṛśīḥ krīḍā yāḥ śrutvā[*90] tatparo bhavet //
GP10bhpc101u:1012: nanv evaṃ ced āptakāmasya nindite kutaḥ pravṛttir ity ata āha-anugrahāyeti
GP10bhpc101u:1013: | śṛṅgāra-rasākṛṣṭacetaso 'tibahirmukhān api svaparān kartum iti bhāvaḥ ||BhPC_10,33.37||
GP10bhpc101u:1014: nāsūyan khalu kṛṣṇāya mohitās tasya māyayā /
GP10bhpc101u:1015: manyamānāḥ svapārśvasthān svān svān dārān vrajaukasaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1016: nanv anye 'pi bhinnācārāḥ svaceṣṭitam evam eveti vadanti tatrāha-nāsūyann iti |
GP10bhpc101u:1018: evaṃbhūtaiśvaryābhāve tathā kurvantaḥ pāpā jñeyā iti bhāvaḥ
GP10bhpc101u:1021: [*91] bhagavān priyo yāsāṃ, bhagavato vā priyāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:1023: vikrīḍitaṃ vrajavadhūbhir idaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ śraddhānvito 'nuśṛṇuyād atha varṇayed yaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1024: bhaktiṃ parāṃ bhagavati pratilabhya kāmaṃ hṛdrogam āśv apahinoty acireṇa dhīraḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1025: bhagavataḥ kāmavijayarūparāsakrīḍāśravaṇādeḥ kāmavijayam eva phalam āha-vikrīḍitam iti
GP10bhpc101u:1026: acireṇa dhīraḥ san hṛdrogaṃ kāmam[*92] āśu apahinoti parityajatīti ||BhPC_10,33.40||
GP10bhpc101u:1027: [*92] yadvā kāmaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ āśu bhaktiṃ labdhvā kāmādisarvahṛdrogam acireṇa hinotīty arthaḥ
GP10bhpc101u:1030: iti śrīmadbhāgavate mahāpurāṇe daśamaskandhe pūrvārdhe bhāvārthadīpikāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ **33**
